oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Name and other information regarding 'Friedrich Hortnoop', a relative of Dia!kwains (L VII.-1. 6046f, 60461, 6046k rev.). Some personal information given about Jan Plat's travelling companion, a |xam called Friedrich Hortnoop (or Frederick Hottentot) including the date and place of his trial and a brief physical description. His prisoner number was 7061. Friedrich Hortnoop left Mowbray in the company of Jan Plat on 10 January 1884 to return to Bushmanland. His grandfather was Dia!kwain's father's brother.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Personal history of Friedrich Hortnoop
